creator: ggregory@seagullsw.com
text:
I am porting from our own logging to log4j and I now pass nulls all over the
place. How about adding:

public void l7dlog(
    Level level, String key, Object[] params) 
public void l7dlog(
    Level level, String key) 

BTW, l7dlog is a pretty poor name IMO. Plain "log" would be fine or
"logLocalized". "l7d" to save 4 letters when I am already using isLogInfoEnabled
(which is a nice obvious name)?

Thanks.
